description: Manage Azure Relay Service Namespace Authorization Rule.

commands.name: az relay namespace authorization-rule create
commands.summary: Create Authorization Rule for the given Relay Service Namespace.
examples: az relay namespace authorization-rule create --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send Listen

commands.name: az relay namespace authorization-rule delete
commands.summary: Deletes the Authorization Rule of the Relay Service Namespace.
examples: az relay namespace authorization-rule delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace- name mynamespace --name myauthorule

commands.name: az relay namespace authorization-rule list
commands.summary: Shows the list of Authorization Rule by Relay Service Namespace.
examples: az relay namespace authorization-rule list --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace

commands.name: az relay namespace authorization-rule show
commands.summary: Shows the details of Relay Service Namespace Authorization Rule.
examples: az relay namespace authorization-rule show --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --name myauthorule

commands.name: az relay namespace authorization-rule update
commands.summary: Updates Authorization Rule for the given Relay Service Namespace.
commands.syntax:
az relay namespace authorization-rule update [--add]
                                             [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--name]
                                             [--namespace-name]
                                             [--remove]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--rights]
                                             [--set]
                                             [--subscription]
examples: az relay namespace authorization-rule update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace- name mynamespace --name myauthorule --rights Send
